original: 河內溫縣人，司馬懿之子。曹髦欲推翻司馬昭奪權自立時，司馬伷與賈充共同率兵圍攻曹髦。晉代魏後，司馬伷率其中一路大軍參與滅吳之戰。
text: A native of Wen County, Hanoi, the son of Sima Yi. When Cao Mao wanted to overthrow Sima Zhao and seize power to become independent, Sima Ni and Jia Chong led their troops to besiege Cao Mao. After the Wei Dynasty in the Jin Dynasty, Sima Ni led one of the troops to participate in the battle to destroy Wu.
